ygData.subject: Re: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks! I ll check it out tonight. Darkmoon
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks! I'll check it out tonight.

Darkmoon

--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh well when you enter from Rathe Mountains go all
> the way to the left and
> you should find it there on a wooden plank.
>
> As for intell items they don't really become
> important utill higher levels
> you don't need them anyway. I know since I didn't
> get any until level 30,
> and I only started out with 120 intell.
>
> Naeeldar
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 1:36 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues
>
>
> >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> >
> >hm...silly question, but where is the single spawn
> >aviak? I am not that familiar with the zone, since
> it
> >seems to be extremly crowded all the time.
> >
> >I want money to buy some of the perks...like a
> >savant's cap, or intelligence earrings. :)
> >
> >--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
> >> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> >>
> >> Overall I don't see any use for money except
> buying
> >> important spells at
> >> those levels. As of right now I would suggest
> that
> >> you take on some Aviak
> >> Guards in Lake Rathe and fight them for a bit.
> They
> >> have decent loot and
> >> great exp. All you really need to do is level
> money
> >> will begin to roll in
> >> the 20's and you'll be fine again money wise.
> >>
> >> Naeeldar
> >>
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> >> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> >> <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> >> Date: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 12:57 PM
> >> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues
> >>
> >>
> >> >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> >> >
> >> >I am a level 16 necromancer, and I am completely
> >> >broke. As of last night, I am worth 3pp and some
> >> >change. Could you all please give me some ideas
> on
> >> >getting money? Killing wisps is extremely boring
> to
> >> me
> >> >since they take forever to track down, don't get
> >> exp,
> >> >and with my luck I get a non-burned out
> lightstone
> >> >once out of 10 times. Lavastorm is boring too
> since
> >> >that is where i spent level 10-12, and dervishes
> >> are
> >> >the same story since that was 12-14.
> >> >
> >> >Any ideas, please? :)
> >> >
> >> >Darkmoon 16th circle necromancer.
